title: Illicit Funds in Crypto Ecosystem Shrank 9% Last Year, Yet Criminals Still Handled Nearly $35B: TRM Labs
description: Illicit activity in the cryptocurrency ecosystem appears to have reduced, with the total illicit funds shrinking by 9% in 2023 compared to 2022, even though criminals still handled over $34 billion worth of cryptocurrencies, Blockchain analytics firm TRM Labs has found.

title: Diamonds Arrive on a Blockchain With New Tokenized Fund on Avalanche Network

title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Wants Validators to Be More Decentralized
description: Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin said the network should impose higher failure penalties on large-scale validators or staking pools.

title: Why is Litecoin price up today?
description:
Today's Litecoin price surge comes after a significant influx of LTC supply into circulation and a rising hash rate ahead of Bitcoin's halving event.

Litecoin (LTC) price is up today, hitting a fresh two-week high amid a broader cryptocurrency market rally.

On March 27, LTC's price rose to around $99, up 9.25% in the last 24 hours. The crypto market was down 1.15% in the same period. Still, Litecoin is underperforming the broader crypto market on a year-to-date (YTD) timeframe, as shown below.

Let's discuss the primary reasons behind Litecoin's price rally today.

Read more
